TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PropertyItem extends System.Object

summary.span: 封裝中繼資料 (Metadata) 屬性來包括在影像檔中。

span.span: Encapsulates a metadata property to be included in an image file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料所組成： 識別項、 屬性、 屬性型別和屬性值的指標的長度 （以位元組為單位）。The data consists of: an identifier, the length (in bytes) of the property, the property type, and a pointer to the property value. A不是要做為獨立的物件。A is not intended to be used as a stand-alone object. A物件適用於由類別衍生自。A object is intended to be used by classes that are derived from . A物件用來擷取和變更現有的映像檔案，不是用來建立中繼資料的中繼資料。A object is used to retrieve and to change the metadata of existing image files, not to create the metadata. 因此，類別沒有定義`Public`建構函式，而且您無法建立的執行個體物件。Therefore, the class does not have a defined `Public` constructor, and you cannot create an instance of a object. 若要暫時解決缺乏`Public`建構函式，使用現有物件而建立的新執行個體類別。To work around the absence of a `Public` constructor, use an existing object instead of creating a new instance of the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何讀取和顯示中繼資料，在映像檔案使用類別和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to read and display the metadata in an image file using the class and the property. 這個範例設計用於匯入在 Windows Form 中命名空間。This example is designed to be used in a Windows Form that imports the namespace. 程式碼貼入表單，並將路徑變更為`fakePhoto.jpg`以指向您的系統上的影像檔。Paste the code into the form and change the path to `fakePhoto.jpg` to point to an image file on your system. 呼叫`ExtractMetaData`方法時處理表單的事件，將傳遞`e`為。Call the `ExtractMetaData` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ImageExample#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ImageExample#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ImageExample/VB/form1.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Id { int get(); void set(int value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the ID of the property.

value.span: 表示屬性 ID 的整數。

span.span: The integer that represents the ID of the property.

property tags, see [Image Property Tag Constants](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=145387). 如需每個屬性標記的說明，請參閱[屬性項目描述](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=145383)。For a description of each MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Len { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 屬性的長度 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the length (in bytes) of the property.

value.span: 整數，表示 位元組陣列的長度 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: An integer that represents the length (in bytes) of the byte array.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property short Type { short get(); void set(short value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定定義 屬性中包含之資料型別的整數。

span.span: Gets or sets an integer that defines the type of data contained in the property.

value.span: 整數，定義 中包含的資料型別。

span.span: An integer that defines the type of data contained in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表顯示整數和它們所代表的類型。The following table shows integers and the types they represent. |整數Integer|表示型別Represented Type| |-------------|----------------------| |11|指定是位元組陣列。Specifies that is an array of bytes.| |22|指定是以 null 結束的 ASCII 字串。Specifies that is a null-terminated ASCII string. 如果您將型別資料成員設 ASCII 類型，您應該設定屬性包含 null 結束字元的字串的長度。If you set the type data member to ASCII type, you should set the property to the length of the string including the null terminator. 例如，字串"Hello"會有長度為 6。For example, the string "Hello" would have a length of 6.| |33|指定是不帶正負號的短 （16 位元） 整數的陣列。Specifies that is an array of unsigned short (16-bit) integers.| |44|指定長時間是陣列的不帶正負號的整數 （32 位元）。Specifies that is an array of unsigned long (32-bit) integers.| |55|指定資料成員是配對的不帶正負號之長整數的陣列。Specifies that data member is an array of pairs of unsigned long integers. 每一組代表小數。第一個整數為分子，而第二個整數為分母。Each pair represents a fraction; the first integer is the numerator and the second integer is the denominator.| |66|指定是可以保存的任何資料類型值的位元組陣列。Specifies that is an array of bytes that can hold values of any data type.| |77|指定陣列的帶正負號長整數 （32 位元）。Specifies that is an array of signed long (32-bit) integers.| |1010|指定是成對的帶正負號之長整數的陣列。Specifies that is an array of pairs of signed long integers. 每一組代表小數。第一個整數為分子，而第二個整數為分母。Each pair represents a fraction; the first integer is the numerator and the second integer is the denominator.| 如需屬性標記的詳細資訊，請參閱 「 映像屬性標記常數 」 在 MSDN library 中http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For more information about property tags, see "Image Property Tag Constants" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Value { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定屬性項目的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the property item.

value.span: 位元組陣列，表示屬性項目的值。

span.span: A byte array that represents the value of the property item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的位元組陣列屬性包含在其中幾種不同的基本類型的資料。The byte array returned by the property contains data in one of several different primitive types. 若要使用的資料，判斷的資料類型使用屬性，以轉換位元組陣列據以。To use the data, determine the data type using the property and convert the byte array accordingly.
